data.trans_hint: Anh ta lái xe lên đường đi bộ.
data.content_game_1: He drives on the crosswalk.
data.answer_en_hint: He drives on the crosswalk.

data.trans: Cột nước cứu hỏa (trên đường phố)
data.trans_hint: Cột nước cứu hỏa là một đường ống trên đường phố, mà thông qua đó có thể lấy nước bằng bơm để dập hỏa hoạn.
data.en_hint: A fire hydrant is a pipe in the street through which water can be sent using a pump in order to put out fires.
data.content_game_1: A fire hydrant is a pipe in the street through which water can be sent using a pump in order to put out fires.
data.answer_en_hint: A fire hydrant is a pipe in the street through which water can be sent using a pump in order to put out fires.

data.trans_hint: Lâu rồi tôi chưa kiểm tra thư trong hòm thư.
data.en_hint: I haven't checked mails on my mailbox for a long time.
data.content_game_1: I haven't checked mails on my mailbox for a long time.
data.answer_en_hint: I haven't checked mails on my mailbox for a long time.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có biết cái biển báo giao thông kia nghĩa là gì không?
data.en_hint: Do you know what this traffic sign means?
data.content_game_1: Do you know what this traffic sign means?
data.answer_en_hint: Do you know what this traffic sign means?

data.trans_hint: Đèn đường tắt lúc 11 giờ tối.
data.en_hint: The street lights are turned off at 11 p.m.
data.content_game_1: The street lights are turned off at 11 p.m.
data.answer_en_hint: The street lights are turned off at 11 p.m.

data.trans_hint: Rẽ trái ở chỗ đèn giao thông.
data.en_hint: Turn left at the traffic lights.
data.content_game_1: Turn left at the traffic lights.
data.answer_en_hint: Turn left at the traffic lights.

data.trans_hint: Chó thường hay tè vào cột điện.
data.en_hint: Dogs always pee on the telephone pole.
data.content_game_1: Dogs always pee on the telephone pole.
data.answer_en_hint: Dogs always pee on the telephone pole.

data.trans_hint: Một cái xe đỗ ở đường đang gây tắc nghẽn đường cao tốc.
data.en_hint: A parked car was obstructing the highway.
data.content_game_1: A parked car was obstructing the highway.
data.answer_en_hint: A parked car was obstructing the highway.

data.trans_hint: Họ đi thảnh thơi trên đại lộ rợp bóng cây.
data.en_hint: They sauntered along the tree-lined boulevard.
data.content_game_1: They sauntered along the tree-lined boulevard.
data.answer_en_hint: They sauntered along the tree-lined boulevard.

data.trans_hint: Rẽ phải ở giao lộ tiếp theo.
data.en_hint: Turn right at the next intersection.
data.content_game_1: Turn right at the next intersection.
data.answer_en_hint: Turn right at the next intersection.
